titleStmt.title: A spiritual songe of thankesgiuing vnto God, for his grace and power. VVritten by a close prisonner (with a coale) for his owne comforte
titleStmt.author: Close prisonner.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Let others singe of this and that,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
